df_info_retrieve_desc.feature_Explanation: info about the explanation of each column of the feature with their unique vals with markdown syntax.
df_info_retrieve_desc.n_duplicates: number of duplicate rows in the dataframe.
df_info_retrieve_desc.correlation: info about the correlation relationships among the features.
df_info_retrieve_desc.feature_data_types: info about the intrepretation of data types of each feature.
df_info_retrieve_desc.summarize_statistics: info about the summarization of statistics of the features.
